title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when export data in table inside a grid cell.
description: When attempting to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown. The following steps should be taken to reproduce the issue:
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table inside a grid cell.
EB: Data should be successfully exported when attempting to export data from a table inside a grid cell.
SR:
1. Insert a grid.
2. Attempt to export data from a table inside a grid cell.
